data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Copperbelt, Zambia be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Copperbelt, Zambia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Copperbelt, Zambia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Copperbelt, Zambia.
data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself real to these new families.
Father, move the 329,486 believers in the state of Copperbelt to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Copperbelt, Zambia to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Lord, please remember the Gujarati people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Copperbelt, Zambia to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Copperbelt.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Copperbelt, Zambia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.
